para.text: writes an SVG file, the kind of units used for page coordinates is not actually specified in the file although it is clearly points (1/72 in). The SVG 1.0 specification states that when units aren't specified,

are to be assumed. Illustrator's failure to override the default is a minor bug since other programs that need to interpret units unambiguously will often assume 96 pixels per inch, not 72 pixels per inch.
